entries.journal_entry_description: Surveyor Keslev has asked you to find and activate the various miner markers which are located around Berken's Flow.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the abandoned droid factory and activate it.
entries.task02_message_box_text: Built by the seperatists shortly before they were found slain in the old Klegger Mining Facility at the end of the Clone Wars. No mining crews who have entered this factory have ever come back.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the Tulrus Isle bridge and activate it.
entries.task04_message_box_text: This Klegger Corp. bridge connects Berken's Flow to the Tulrus Nesting Grounds. Due to the highly dangerous nature of the nesting grounds and their relative lack of resources, this bridge is hardly ever used.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the Jedi ruins and activate it.
entries.task06_message_box_text: The ruins were uncovered...edit...WARNING: The party of archeologists who were examining these ruins formed themselves into some sort of dangerous cult. They worship a man they call the Storm Lord and will attack anyone who does not accept him as a god.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the Old Republic facility and activate it.
entries.task08_message_box_text: WARNING: Sealed by the order of Milo Mensix. This ancient facility, dating back to the days of the Old Republic, is overrun with still active security droids and the occasional beast which gets trapped inside.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker in the heart of Berken's Flow and activate it.
entries.task10_message_box_text: Named after the famed Mustafarian Jesl Berken, Berken's Flow was once the richest source of raw minerals in the known galaxy. The wealth of Mustafar all started with the discovery of Berken's Flow. Today, most of its minerals extracted, Berken's Flow is used only for the smallest of mining operations.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: There are five markers located around Berken's Flow, located to the northeast of the Mensix Mining Facility. Surveyor Keslev has asked you to find all five of them and check the information on them.
